question: Which of the following organisations publishes an Annual Liveability Index of cities across the world?
explanation: The Economist Intelligence Unit (EIU) publishes an annual Global Liveability Ranking. It ranks 140 cities for their urban quality of life based on assessments of stability, healthcare, culture & environment, education and infrastructure. Recently, the Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs in India has also decided to bring out a liveability index of 116 cities, including the 99 smart cities already identified, state capitals, and cities with 1 million-plus population. The ministry aims to involve the Economist Intelligence Unit, for successful implementation of the project.
